articles.title: New fossils reveal specialized eating technique of unusual ancient marine reptile - CNN
articles.description: Fossils have revealed an ancient marine reptile with a loosely connected jaw that allowed its throat to balloon out to a massive size so it could filter feed the way right whales do today.
